lom:description.lom:string:
"The First-Year Engineering Program is a student-oriented, service program tasked with recruiting, advising, teaching, and retaining outstanding Purdue Engineering students. The first-year curriculum provides a solid academic foundation and overview of engineering fields and careers.
The Interdisciplinary Engineering Program is for the undergraduate engineering student with specific career goals that cannot be accommodated within a traditional engineering field.
The Multidisciplinary Engineering Program serves undergraduate students interested in bringing together multiple engineering disciplines at an advanced level to solve societal challenges.
The graduate programs serve students interested in studying the science of learning engineering. They focus on engineering education discovery, scholarship, and academic reform."

lom:title.lom:string: Curricular Program in Engineering Education at Purdue University
